name: Valley National Bancorp
description: Valley National Bancorp is a financial services holding company headquartered in New Jersey, primarily engaged in providing banking and related financial services. Founded in 1927, Valley has experienced significant growth through a combination of organic expansion and strategic acquisitions, positioning itself as a leading regional bank in the northeastern United States. The bank offers a wide range of financial products and services, including personal and commercial banking, residential and commercial real estate loans, wealth management, and treasury services. Valley National Bank operates over 200 branches across New Jersey, New York, Florida, and Alabama, serving a diverse clientele, from individuals to small and mid-sized businesses. The company is committed to community involvement and supporting local initiatives, reflecting its dedication to enhancing the economic vitality of the regions it serves. Valley National Bancorp is publicly traded and maintains a strong focus on customer service, leveraging technology to improve banking experiences while managing risk prudently. With a strong capital position and a commitment to growth, the bank aims to continue expanding its footprint and enhancing shareholder value.

seo.meta_title: Valley National Bancorp | Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Valley National Bancorp, a leading financial services provider offering comprehensive banking solutions. Learn about our products, services, and commitment to community.

faq.question: What services does Valley National Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: Valley National Bancorp offers personal banking, commercial banking, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Valley National Bancorp?
faq.answer: Ira Robbins is the CEO of Valley National Bancorp.

faq.question: Where is Valley National Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Valley National Bancorp is headquartered in Parsippany, New Jersey, USA.

faq.question: When was Valley National Bancorp founded?
faq.answer: Valley National Bancorp was founded in 1927.
